alcove.Body:
Details

Alcove Small Bookcase

The perfect bookcase for when space is limited but you need to squeeze in that extra bit of storage. Made from solid oak with a beautifully simple crafted finish, this bookcase is perfect for a small bedroom or even a small living room. 

The Details

  • Made by hand in Europe using sustainably sourced oak
  • Finished in a light natural oil to keep the oak looking as close to it's natural state as possible
  • No two pieces will be the same as each piece of oak has it's own unique characteristics

Our Alcove Range

This range began when our founder, Sallie found that most storage units won't fit into slim alcoves.  The new cupboard, bookcase and drawer unit in this range have been carefully designed to be shallow and narrow with high legs to promote a feeling of space.

We believe that furniture that is crammed-in can make a room feel cramped. These new pieces with sliding doors, clean lines and slim angled legs will fit comfortably into small spaces and promote a light and airy feel.

 

 
Dimensions

W75 x D22 x H87cm

Leg height - 15cm

Shelf height - 21.6cm

bedroom.Name: Oak Bedside Table With Crossover Leg
bedroom.Body:
Details

Product Details 

Our solid oak bedside table is inspired by the simplicity of scandinavian design. With its clean lines and natural design, this bedside table will enhance any bedroom. Designed for the smaller bedroom, our oak bedside is petite but will still fit everything you need. 

The first standing bedside to be designed by Urbansize, this perfectly matches our other two floating oak bedside tables in look and feel. The perfect solution if you have a little more room on one side of your bed to the other. 

The crossed legs are reminiscent of the popular butler table design but with a spacious drawer on top, you will find this much more useful. Plenty of room to store away all your messy bits and pieces in the drawer and display your lamp, clock and books on the generous surface. 

Details 

Made from 100% solid European oak, no veneer. 

The oak is finished in a matt oil to keep the wood looking as natural as possible.

Legs supplied separately, so there is a small amount of self assembly required, but it is very simple - attach the legs using the bolts.

Oak care instructions
Dimensions

W40cm x D30cm x H50cm

bedroom.Name: Floating Bedside Table
bedroom.Body:
Details

About this product

This bedside is made of 100% Beech. All our products are made of solid wood, we never use veneer. 

The white, black and grey bedsides are painted in a silk (matt) finish paint. 

Maximum weight allowance - 10kg

We provide universal wall fittings and easy to follow instructions. For plasterboard specific info, please see installation instructions.

Installation video available on our FAQ page

Also available in large


About our floating bedsides 

Our Floating Bedside Table is the practical and stylish solution when you have limited space for a bedside table.

It has a simple clean design for that laid-back scandi vibe as well as having maximum storage and practical value. You can easily fit a lamp, alarm clock and cuppa on the top and your book/kindle on the shelf. There is a generous size drawer to store away all those messy bits.

Fitting the bedside to your wall is super simple and wall mounting your bedside means that you leave the underneath free for additional storage and easily accessing under bed drawers.
Dimensions

W30cm x D20cm x H18cm

Internal drawer measurements - W25 x D15.5 x H7.5cm

From bottom of drawer to shelf - 6.8cm

bedroom.Name: Plywood Locker Bedside Table
bedroom.Body:
Details

When your bedroom is short on space, sometimes you need all the storage space you can get. We designed our plywood locker bedside so that you get max storage in a small space without losing out on style. 

 

About this product

Made by hand in Europe.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

Slightly taller than most bedsides so you really maximise storage space

3 locker style 'vent' holes for that locker look

Choose from left hand or right hand to create the perfect symmetry for your room. 

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Although we designed this as a bedside table, it can be used for any storage situation like a front room or children's room storage. In a bedroom, it can be mix and matched with our plywood bedside table. We've kept it simple with an old school alarm clock and dried flowers for a meditative restful bedroom. 

 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish 
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H75cm

Locker size - 50cm(h) internal shelf 1 - 14cm, internal shelf 2 - 31cm.

Details

About this product 

Smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that scandi look but in any small space.

This bedside is made by hand in Europe. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers, even within the round handle. We've used round integrated handles, special finger nook inside for easy opening

This is all fully assembled other than the legs. We send them unattached to try to prevent breakages. It's easy to attach - a simple alan key job. Fittings are included so you won't need a thing.

Of course, it’s perfect for a bedside table. It can be mix and matched with our plywood locker bedside. All it needs is a simple table lamp (maybe a ceiling pendant?), a coaster ready for your morning cuppa, and your latest book.

bedroom.Body:
Details

About this product


Cord available in white or pink - please specify in your order details.

Our plywood floating bedsides are smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that sleek scandi look but in any small space. The shelf is big enough for a book or kindle. There is a slot for your mobile phone and a subtle slit for the charger to go down.

These bedsides are made by hand in Europe. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers. The edges on the bedside are mitred edges - harder to achieve, but we think it's definitely worth it.

Cost is per pair. We supply a left and a right so that the light is right next to the bed. The bedsides are fully assembled, you just need to attach it to the wall. Fittings and instructions supplied. You just need a drill.

The first standing bedside to be designed by Urbansize, this perfectly matches our other two floating oak bedside tables in look and feel. The perfect solution if you have a little more room on one side of your bed to the other.

bedroom-revamp.Name: Alcove Small Chest of Drawers
bedroom-revamp.Body:
Details

Made to order item - 6 week delivery window

Alcove Small Chest of Drawers

The perfect drawers for when space is limited but you need to squeeze in that extra bit of storage. Made from solid oak with a beautifully simple crafted finish, these drawers look great in a small bedroom or even a small living room. 

The Details

  • Made by hand in Europe using sustainably sourced oak
  • Finished in a light natural oil to keep the oak looking as close to it's natural state as possible
  • No two pieces will be the same as each piece of oak has it's own unique characteristics
  • Each wooden handle has a grooved finger grip underneath for easy opening

Our Alcove Range

This range began when our founder, Sallie found that most storage units won't fit into slim alcoves.  The new cupboard, bookcase and drawer unit in this range have been carefully designed to be shallow and narrow with high legs to promote a feeling of space.

We believe that furniture that is crammed-in can make a room feel cramped. These new pieces with sliding doors, clean lines and slim angled legs will fit comfortably into small spaces and promote a light and airy feel.

 

 
Dimensions
W75 x D40 x H75cm

About this product

Designed with 'hybrid' office workers in mind. When you work part in an office and partly at home, you might not want to give over a whole space to working from home. This desk gives you the option to easily fold it away and store it on days when you aren't working. Still with the exceptional oak quality that you can expect from Urbansize, and a sizeable working space but just, only on the days you need it. 

Also see our matching oak stool here

beds.Name: Floating Bed With Secret Bedside
beds.Body:
Details
Our Urbansize floating bed helps you fit everything you need into a small space. No room for a bedside? No problem this bed has it's own fold out bedside so you have your cuppa in the morning but you can handily stow it away during the day so that you can have more room to move round your bed.

The style of this bed is pure scandi. Simple clean lines and natural finish beech wood bring that hygge feeling into your bedroom. We have used solid beech across the whole bed and finished it in a natural oil so that the wood looks as close to its natural state as possible.

The bed is of 'floating' appearance to maintain a lightness to the bed again to maximise the feeling of space and light in the room.

The best thing about the simplicity of this bed is that you can keep it looking minimalist with crisp white bed sheets or pile it up to a cosy oasis with linens and throws.

UK double bed size

bedside-tables.Name: Plywood Bedside Table
bedside-tables.Body:
Details

About this product 

Smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that scandi look but in any small space.

This bedside is made by hand in Europe. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers, even within the round handle. We've used round integrated handles, special finger nook inside for easy opening

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

This is all fully assembled other than the legs. We send them unattached to try to prevent breakages. It's easy to attach - a simple alan key job. Fittings are included so you won't need a thing.


How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Of course, it’s perfect for a bedside table. It can be mix and matched with our plywood locker bedside. All it needs is a simple table lamp (maybe a ceiling pendant?), a coaster ready for your morning cuppa, and your latest book. 

 

More about our London Ply Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish 
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H55cm 

Leg length 40cm

Internal drawer dimensions W33.5 x D22 x H8cm

Details

When your bedroom is short on space, sometimes you need all the storage space you can get. We designed our plywood locker bedside so that you get max storage in a small space without losing out on style.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

coffee-tables.Name: Plywood Coffee Table
coffee-tables.Body:
Details

It can be hard to find a coffee table for small spaces. Our ethos of storage + style have culminated in this small space coffee table. 


We're all about the details

1. Made by hand in Europe, with care

2. The spacious drawer runs all the way through from front to back so it maximises the space available;

3. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers;

4. Every edge is mitred, harder to achieve in the workshop, but worth it we think for the clean and minimalist finish

5. The finish is minimal, keeping that raw natural clear look that we know and love for scandi minimalism

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

How we imagine you will use the furniture in your home

We envisaged this throughout the design process as the perfect small space coffee table. However, it would also work for storage in a small alcove or for a media console (use that drawer for all those random remote controls!). 

 

More about our London Ply Range

We admit it, we're plywood geeks! Whilst initially drawn to Plywood as a material because of the pared back, minimalist look we love, it turns out it is also a fantastic material to work with. Here's why:

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish 

 

 

 
Dimensions

 W70 x D40 x H40cm 

Coffee table to floor: 25cm

Internal drawer W19.5 x D33 x H10cm

This is all fully assembled other than the legs. We send them unattached to try to prevent breakages. It's super simple to attach them, a simple alan key job and fittings are all included so you won't need a thing

Details

Simple Oak side table which will squeeze into the smallest of space down the side of your sofa. Use for your coffee (or wine!) whilst watching netflix. Or alternatively, use as a super chic plant stand.  

We're all about the details

1. Made by hand in Europe, with care, using sustainably sourced European wood

2. Each piece of oak is individual and no two will be the same, a completely unique table to you

3. We love natural oak and embrace the variations and changes in each piece, reflecting the tree that it came from. 

4. Every edge is mitred, harder to achieve in the workshop, but worth it we think for the clean and minimalist finish

About our floating bedsides

The latest addition to our floating bedside table range, the floating bedside table in solid oak. Our floating bedsides are the perfect stylish solution when you have limited space for a bedside table.

It has a simple clean design for that laid-back scandi vibe as well as having maximum storage and practical value. You can easily fit a lamp, alarm clock and cuppa on the top and your book/kindle on the shelf. There is a generous size drawer to store away all those messy bits.

Fitting the bedside to your wall is super simple and wall mounting your bedside means that you leave the underneath free for additional storage and easily accessing under bed drawers. We provide the wall mountings and clear easy to follow instructions. 


About this product

Made from sustainably sourced solid EU oak. 

We finished the bedside in a natural oil to keep colour and feel as close to raw oak as possible.

Maximum weight allowance - 10kg

floating-bedside-tables.Body:
Details

About this product

Made by hand in Europe.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers.

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

With a drawer, surface space AND shelf you have all the room for your bedside needs.

Smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that scandi look but in any small space.

This is all fully assembled, you just need to attach it to the wall. Fittings and instructions supplied. You just need a drill.

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Of course, it’s perfect for a bedside table. It can be mix and matched with our plywood locker bedside. 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish  
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H18cm

floating-bedside-tables.Name: Plywood Floating Bedside Table - PAIR
floating-bedside-tables.Body:
Details

About this product


Cord available in white or pink - please specify in your order details.

Our plywood floating bedsides are smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that sleek scandi look but in any small space. The shelf is big enough for a book or kindle. There is a slot for your mobile phone and a subtle slit for the charger to go down.

These bedsides are made by hand in Europe. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers. The edges on the bedside are mitred edges - harder to achieve, but we think it's definitely worth it.

Cost is per pair. We supply a left and a right so that the light is right next to the bed. The bedsides are fully assembled, you just need to attach it to the wall. Fittings and instructions supplied. You just need a drill.

 

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Of course, it’s perfect for a bedside table. It can be mix and matched with our plywood locker bedside. 

 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish  
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H10cm

frontpage.Name: Alcove Small Bookcase
frontpage.Body:
Details

Alcove Small Bookcase

The perfect bookcase for when space is limited but you need to squeeze in that extra bit of storage. Made from solid oak with a beautifully simple crafted finish, this bookcase is perfect for a small bedroom or even a small living room. 

The Details

  • Made by hand in Europe using sustainably sourced oak
  • Finished in a light natural oil to keep the oak looking as close to it's natural state as possible
  • No two pieces will be the same as each piece of oak has it's own unique characteristics

Our Alcove Range

This range began when our founder, Sallie found that most storage units won't fit into slim alcoves.  The new cupboard, bookcase and drawer unit in this range have been carefully designed to be shallow and narrow with high legs to promote a feeling of space.

We believe that furniture that is crammed-in can make a room feel cramped. These new pieces with sliding doors, clean lines and slim angled legs will fit comfortably into small spaces and promote a light and airy feel.

 

 
Dimensions

W75 x D22 x H87cm

Leg height - 15cm

Shelf height - 21.6cm

furniture.Name: Oak Bedside Table With Crossover Leg
furniture.Body:
Details

Product Details 

Our solid oak bedside table is inspired by the simplicity of scandinavian design. With its clean lines and natural design, this bedside table will enhance any bedroom. Designed for the smaller bedroom, our oak bedside is petite but will still fit everything you need. 

The first standing bedside to be designed by Urbansize, this perfectly matches our other two floating oak bedside tables in look and feel. The perfect solution if you have a little more room on one side of your bed to the other. 

The crossed legs are reminiscent of the popular butler table design but with a spacious drawer on top, you will find this much more useful. Plenty of room to store away all your messy bits and pieces in the drawer and display your lamp, clock and books on the generous surface. 

Details 

Made from 100% solid European oak, no veneer. 

The oak is finished in a matt oil to keep the wood looking as natural as possible.

Legs supplied separately, so there is a small amount of self assembly required, but it is very simple - attach the legs using the bolts.

Oak care instructions
Dimensions

W40cm x D30cm x H50cm

furniture.Name: Floating Bed With Secret Bedside
furniture.Body:
Details
Our Urbansize floating bed helps you fit everything you need into a small space. No room for a bedside? No problem this bed has it's own fold out bedside so you have your cuppa in the morning but you can handily stow it away during the day so that you can have more room to move round your bed.

The style of this bed is pure scandi. Simple clean lines and natural finish beech wood bring that hygge feeling into your bedroom. We have used solid beech across the whole bed and finished it in a natural oil so that the wood looks as close to its natural state as possible.

The bed is of 'floating' appearance to maintain a lightness to the bed again to maximise the feeling of space and light in the room.

The best thing about the simplicity of this bed is that you can keep it looking minimalist with crisp white bed sheets or pile it up to a cosy oasis with linens and throws.

UK double bed size
Dimensions

Standard double

furniture.Name: Plywood Locker Bedside Table
furniture.Body:
Details

When your bedroom is short on space, sometimes you need all the storage space you can get. We designed our plywood locker bedside so that you get max storage in a small space without losing out on style. 

 

About this product

Made by hand in Europe.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

Slightly taller than most bedsides so you really maximise storage space

3 locker style 'vent' holes for that locker look

Choose from left hand or right hand to create the perfect symmetry for your room. 

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Although we designed this as a bedside table, it can be used for any storage situation like a front room or children's room storage. In a bedroom, it can be mix and matched with our plywood bedside table. We've kept it simple with an old school alarm clock and dried flowers for a meditative restful bedroom. 

 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish 
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H75cm

Locker size - 50cm(h) internal shelf 1 - 14cm, internal shelf 2 - 31cm.

last-chance.Body:
Details

About this product


Cord available in white or pink - please specify in your order details.

Our plywood floating bedsides are smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that sleek scandi look but in any small space. The shelf is big enough for a book or kindle. There is a slot for your mobile phone and a subtle slit for the charger to go down.

These bedsides are made by hand in Europe. We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers. The edges on the bedside are mitred edges - harder to achieve, but we think it's definitely worth it.

Cost is per pair. We supply a left and a right so that the light is right next to the bed. The bedsides are fully assembled, you just need to attach it to the wall. Fittings and instructions supplied. You just need a drill.

Alcove Small Bookcase

The perfect bookcase for when space is limited but you need to squeeze in that extra bit of storage. Made from solid oak with a beautifully simple crafted finish, this bookcase is perfect for a small bedroom or even a small living room. 

The Details

  • Made by hand in Europe using sustainably sourced oak
  • Finished in a light natural oil to keep the oak looking as close to it's natural state as possible
  • No two pieces will be the same as each piece of oak has it's own unique characteristics

Our Alcove Range

This range began when our founder, Sallie found that most storage units won't fit into slim alcoves.  The new cupboard, bookcase and drawer unit in this range have been carefully designed to be shallow and narrow with high legs to promote a feeling of space.

We believe that furniture that is crammed-in can make a room feel cramped. These new pieces with sliding doors, clean lines and slim angled legs will fit comfortably into small spaces and promote a light and airy feel.

living-room.Body:
Details

This design is a twist on our original simple coffee table. We wanted something with CURVES and this is it. This one has a beautifully finished piece of solid oak, with mitred edges for that clean, scandi minimalist look. We added a super simple white shelf underneath for styling your favourite coffee table books and voila, a super simple beautiful coffee table was born. 

We're all about the details

1. Made by hand in Europe, with care, using sustainably sourced European wood

2. Each piece of oak is individual and no two will be the same, a completely unique table to you

3. We love natural oak and embrace the variations and changes in each piece, reflecting the tree that it came from. 

4. Every edge is mitred, harder to achieve in the workshop, but worth it we think for the clean and minimalist finish

5. The finish is minimal, keeping that raw natural clear look that we know and love for scandi minimalism

 

Oak Care Instructions

 

How we imagine you will use the furniture in your home

We envisaged this throughout the design process as the perfect small space coffee table. However, it would also work for storage in a small alcove or for a media console. Add one of our oak side tables to match and use as a chic plant stand. 

 
Dimensions

 W90 x D45 x H40cm

new-in.Name: Curved oak bedside table
new-in.Body:
ORDER NOW FOR DELIVERY EARLY JULY

Curved range 

Our new curved range was inspired by the softer, organic shapes of nature which bring a more relaxed and calm energy to interiors. Whilst we love clean lines and minimalism, the gentleness of a curved edge helps bring a new dimension and depth to a space. Round edges can be useful in compact spaces to help give a sense of space around a piece of furniture. 

Hand made in Europe with locally sourced oak. 

Curved Oak Bedside Table 

This beautiful curved bedside table is a piece of art and has been skilfully crafted by our team in Europe. This level of curve is extremely hard to achieve in oak and we are so proud of the fabulous look and feel of this dressing table. 

A compact size but plenty of space inside the drawer for all your bits and pieces

Turned round legs add to the minimalist feel of this dressing table. All the classic Urbansize design features like handless drawers (there's a finger grip underneath to open the drawer) and high quality European oak will give you a statement piece for your bedroom.

side-tables.Name: Oak Simple Side Table
side-tables.Body:
Details

Simple Oak side table which will squeeze into the smallest of space down the side of your sofa. Use for your coffee (or wine!) whilst watching netflix. Or alternatively, use as a super chic plant stand.  

We're all about the details

1. Made by hand in Europe, with care, using sustainably sourced European wood

2. Each piece of oak is individual and no two will be the same, a completely unique table to you

3. We love natural oak and embrace the variations and changes in each piece, reflecting the tree that it came from. 

4. Every edge is mitred, harder to achieve in the workshop, but worth it we think for the clean and minimalist finish

5. The finish is minimal, keeping that raw natural clear look that we know and love for scandi minimalism

 

Oak Care Instructions

 

How we imagine you will use the furniture in your home

We thought this made the perfect teeny side table when you have no room for a large side table next to your sofa. However, it also makes a super chic plant stand.

side-tables.Name: Plywood Locker Bedside Table
side-tables.Body:
Details

When your bedroom is short on space, sometimes you need all the storage space you can get. We designed our plywood locker bedside so that you get max storage in a small space without losing out on style. 

 

About this product

Made by hand in Europe.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

Slightly taller than most bedsides so you really maximise storage space

3 locker style 'vent' holes for that locker look

Choose from left hand or right hand to create the perfect symmetry for your room. 

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

 

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Although we designed this as a bedside table, it can be used for any storage situation like a front room or children's room storage. In a bedroom, it can be mix and matched with our plywood bedside table. We've kept it simple with an old school alarm clock and dried flowers for a meditative restful bedroom. 

 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish 
Dimensions

W40 x D30 x H75cm

Locker size - 50cm(h) internal shelf 1 - 14cm, internal shelf 2 - 31cm.

About this product

Made by hand in Europe.

We've exposed and made a feature of the ply layers.

Mitred edges - harder to achieve, but definitely worth it.

With a drawer, surface space AND shelf you have all the room for your bedside needs.

Smaller than most bedside tables, so you can achieve that scandi look but in any small space.

This is all fully assembled, you just need to attach it to the wall. Fittings and instructions supplied. You just need a drill.

Plywood care instructions

About our plywood

How we imagine you will use this furniture in your home

Of course, it’s perfect for a bedside table. It can be mix and matched with our plywood locker bedside. 

More about our Plywood Range

We admit it, we’re plywood geeks! Whilst Initially drawn to plywood as a material because of the pared back minimalist look we love, it turns out it is a fantastic material to work with. Here’s why.

It's sustainable, read more about that in this blog post;

It's lighter than other woods, but also much stronger, dare we say, kid proof? It's perfect for today's nomadic urban living. Take it from room to room, apartment to apartment, it will last and last.

We use super high grade birch plywood which means every layer is birch and it has a clean even colour finish
